name: Interplanet Ex
description:
Enter your spaceship to transport Meilooriuns and Zergs across the universe.

In Interplanet Ex, you control a space trucker on board of an old ship. Unfortunately, your ship collides with an asteroid, and everything starts to go wrong.

Fix your engines, guarantee your oxygen, and don't let your ship crash on this tragic journey.

*This game was developed to be submitted to the Mundane Jam (8 Bits to Infinity) 2021. All the assets, code, music and sound effects were developed in 7 days, between March 15 and March 22.
